derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin fomentatio(n-), from the verb fomentare (see foment)

means.word_mean: 1. application of warm wet coverings to a part of the body to relieve pain and inflammation
2. deliberate and intentional triggering (of trouble or discord)
(用于伤口等的)热罨剂,热敷剂
